name: Aspire Capital Fund
overview: Aspire Capital Fund LLC is a Chicago-based investment fund with a focus on making direct investments in publicly traded companies in a broad range of industries and investment structures. Aspire Capital Fund LLC is managed by Aspire Capital Partners LLC. They offer innovative investment structures designed for publicly traded companies whose prospects are bright, but who need additional capital to fuel their growth. Aspire Capital provides these companies with an easy and fair way to sell equity as the company achieves its business objectives.

funding_round.source_description: MediciNova Enters Into a $20 Million Common Stock Purchase Agreement With Aspire Capital Fund
